titleStmt.title: The coppy of a letter sent from General Leishley, to the lord generall the Earle of Holland, and read in the House of Commons, the 7th. of Iuly, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Leven, Alexander Leslie, Earl of, 1580?-1661.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: H. Leishley.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
